name: Angry Hog Head
description:
Angry Hog Head. The root tootin arcade shooter of the future.  Blast your way through enemies earning points while earning back your life to spend it on amazing goodies to make you last longer that's right "Last longer, play harder" 

/* Player Controls*/

A-D for left-right movement. k for shooting. j for machine gun. l for shotgun.

/* Health Functionality */

Lose one bar of health each time entering battle, only to earn your health back based off how many enemies that you kill. Once this bar is depleted, you lose.
